instruction: Patient previously experienced stomach issues with sertraline; since switching to fluoxetine, no gastrointestinal problems reported. Mood has remained stable after recent dose adjustment despite hectic work environment. Patient takes fluoxetine every morning, uses phone reminder, and reports no missed doses.

attributes.narrative: The patient reports that the stomach issues they experienced while on sertraline have resolved since switching to fluoxetine. Their mood has remained stable after the recent dose adjustment, despite a hectic work schedule. They take fluoxetine every morning, use a phone reminder, and have not missed any doses.

instruction: Major depressive disorder, single episode, unspecified: mood reported as stable, patient not feeling overwhelmed, current treatment appears effective without notable side effects.

attributes.background: Mood is reported as stable, the patient is not feeling overwhelmed, and current treatment is effective without notable side effects.
attributes.narrative: Depression remains stable on current therapy with no new concerns.

instruction: Fluoxetine: patient currently takes once daily in the morning, adherence confirmed, no gastrointestinal side effects.

attributes.sig: Take once daily in the morning
